name: Lost in Translation (Poodle Cult, mwahahavilah, Chris McGinnis)
name_original: Lost in Translation (Poodle Cult, mwahahavilah, Chris McGinnis)
description: You are Medi8tr(TM) Economy Translator Android v4, , helping to provide budget translation services to species trying to negotiate peace. Too bad your translation chip's busted, right? If you can just fake it through one last gig, you'll finally be able to afford to get patched up. Careful you don't get caught being defective though, or you'll be decommissioned to protect the sterling reputation of Medi8tr(TM), the galaxy's fifth favorite economy translating service.
